keys.string: Oh you find any cool stuff lying around?
You should. Only if you are caught up on your Homework. You can find some interesting things.
I found a bottle of touch of grey one time. And no, I didn’t use it... Baka.
Make sure to complete as much of your homework as possible though. The Teachers remember... They always remember...
The teachers will like you more the better you do on your homework. So don’t slack off.

ArrayOfString.string: [Jace][Option]Have you had a chance to take a good look around the dorms?
[Jace][Dialog]Oh you find any cool stuff lying around?
[Jace][Dialog]I found a bottle of touch of grey one time. And no, I didn’t use it... Baka.
[Jace][Dialog]You should. Only if you are caught up on your Homework. You can find some interesting things.
[Jace][Dialog]I found a bottle of touch of grey one time. And no, I didn’t use it... Baka.
[Jace][Dialog]Make sure to complete as much of your homework as possible though. The Teachers remember... They always remember...
[Narrator][Option]Jace’s eyes grow wide trying to look frightened. It worked.
[Jace][Dialog]The teachers will like you more the better you do on your homework. So don’t slack off.
